channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 系図トラッカーのMyHeritageがOldNews.comを立ち上げ、主に1800年代と1900年代の新聞、小さな町のジャーナル、公報へのアクセスを年間99ドルで提供（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Genealogy tracker MyHeritage launches OldNews.com, offering access to newspapers, small-town journals, and gazettes mainly from the 1800s and 1900s for $99/year  —  MyHeritage announced today that it's launching OldNews.com, a new website that offers access to thousands of historical newspapers, mainly from the 1800s and 1900s.

item.title: 米判事、グーグルは広告主の反トラスト法違反訴訟に向き合うべきとするも、大手広告主が使用する広告購入ツールに焦点を当てたものなど、一部の主張を棄却（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
A US judge says Google must face advertisers' antitrust lawsuit, but dismisses some claims, including those focused on ad-buying tools used by large advertisers  —  Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google must face advertisers' proposed class action lawsuit claiming that it monopolizes the ad exchange market, a U.S. judge ruled on Friday.

item.title: ガネットのデザート・サン社で組合員がストライキ、公正な労働契約を求め、3年間定期的な生活費昇給を拒否されていると訴える (@tdsnewsguild)
item.description:
@tdsnewsguild:
Union members strike at Gannett's Desert Sun, calling for a fair labor contract and saying they've been denied regular cost-of-living raises for three years  —  It's official: As of 7 a.m. today, @TDSNewsGuild is now on strike!!! Taking this step is not easy. But after being denied any sort of regular cost of living raises for the last three years, we decided it's time to deny @Gannett our labor until a fair contract is reached!

item.title: 2月13日にロンドンで行われた全員参加の会合で、CNNスタッフがマーク・トンプソンEICらにイスラエル・ガザ報道について詰め寄り、クリスティアン・アマンプールは「二重基準」を批判した（The Intercept）。
item.description:
The Intercept:
At a Feb. 13 all-hands in London, CNN staff pressed EIC Mark Thompson and others about Israel-Gaza coverage; Christiane Amanpour criticized “double standards”  —  CNN employees, including the renowned international news anchor Christiane Amanpour, confronted network executives …

item.title: ダイヤモンドスポーツが破産再建計画を提出、RSNのバリー社との命名権契約の終了を含む、コードカットで2200万人の加入者減（Anthony Crupi/Sportico）
item.description:
Anthony Crupi / Sportico:
Diamond Sports files its bankruptcy reorg plan, which includes ending its Bally naming rights deal for RSNs, and says cord-cutting led to 22M fewer subscribers  —  Almost a year to the day after Diamond Sports filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the operator of the 19 Bally Sports-branded RSNs …

item.title: カナダ遺産相、ローカル・ジャーナリズム・イニシアチブを3年間延長するため、5,880万カナダドルを拠出すると発表。
item.description:
Government of Canada:
Canada's heritage minister announces CA$58.8M to extend the Local Journalism Initiative for three years; the program funded 400+ journalism jobs in 2023-2024  —  News release  —  Local journalism reflects our day-to-day realities, informs us about issues that might affect us and …

item.title: Guardian』紙の編集革新責任者クリス・モランに、「アクティブな滞在時間」をランキング指標とする新しい「Deeply Read」リストについてインタビュー（Laura Hazard Owen/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Laura Hazard Owen / Nieman Lab:
An interview with Chris Moran, the Guardian's head of editorial innovation, about its new “Deeply Read” list, which uses an “active time spent” ranking metric  —  The No. 1 most-clicked story on The Guardian's U.S. site right now: “Alabama IVF ruling leaves Republicans stuck between …

item.title: Metaは、現在Techmeme、Sprinklr、HootsuiteなどのパートナーによってテストされているThreads APIを、2024年6月までに開発者が広く利用できるようにする計画だ（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
Meta plans to make its Threads API, currently being tested by partners like Techmeme, Sprinklr, and Hootsuite, broadly available to developers by June 2024  —  Meta-owned social network Threads said today that it will make its API broadly available to developers by June.

item.title: アマゾンが、AIが作成した作品の流れを食い止めるため、人間が執筆した書籍の仲間だと主張する「要約」や「ワークブック」の出版を制限し始めた（Will Oremus/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Will Oremus / Washington Post:
To stem the tide of AI-generated work, Amazon starts limiting the publication of “summaries” and “workbooks” that claim to be companions to human-authored books  —  Authors decry an “explosion” of knockoff books on Amazon as the company struggles to keep up.

item.title: FuboTV、第4四半期純損益は前年同期比26%減の$71M、世界売上は前年同期比28%増の$410.2M、加入者数$370M、北米加入者数は前年同期比12%増の161万人（Etan Vlessing/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Etan Vlessing / The Hollywood Reporter:
FuboTV reports a $71M Q4 net loss, down 26% YoY, global revenue up 28% YoY to $410.2M, $370M from subscriptions, 1.61M subscribers in North America, up 12% YoY  —  David Gandler called out the upcoming Disney, Fox and Warner Bros. Discovery venture as his sports streamer hit 1.61 million subscribers and shrank its fourth-quarter loss.

item.title: SpotifyがAudiobooks Access Tierを開始、米国の無料ユーザーは月額9.99ドルで毎月20万冊以上のカタログから15時間のオーディオブックをストリーミングできる（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Spotify launches the Audiobooks Access Tier, which lets free US users stream 15 hours of audiobooks from its 200K+ catalog every month for $9.99 per month  —  After adding 15 hours of free audiobooks listening to its subscription plan late last year, Spotify today is introducing …

item.title: 豪首相、メディア企業への支払いを停止すると発言したメタ社への措置を脅す；ニューズ・コーポレーションは小規模メディア・グループの存続を脅かすと発言（Nic Fildes/Financial Times）
item.description:
Nic Fildes / Financial Times:
Australia's PM threatens action against Meta after it said it would stop paying media companies; News Corp says it threatens the viability of small media groups  —  Prime minister pledges to respond to move that News Corp says threatens viability of some media groups

item.title: ディズニーとリライアンスの合併により、インドでクリケットを独占するTVプレーヤーが誕生する：ディズニーはIPLのテレビ放映権を、リライアンスはIPLのストリーミング放映権を持つ（Arpan Chaturvedi/Reuters）
item.description:
Arpan Chaturvedi / Reuters:
The Disney-Reliance merger would create a TV player that dominates cricket in India: Disney has IPL TV broadcast rights and Reliance has IPL streaming rights  —  A proposed merger of Walt Disney's and Reliance's media assets in India could spark intense antitrust scrutiny over their market power …

item.title: ポッドキャスティングの市場調整が進む中、大スターは依然として8桁や9桁の契約を結んでいるが、一方で平社員は労働組合の保護を求めている（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Amid a market correction in podcasting, the biggest stars still get eight- and nine-figure contracts, while rank-and-file employees push for union protections  —  While mega-deals come roaring back, rank-and-file podcasters are seeking basic labor protections  —  Welcome back to Soundbite.

item.title: BBC Studiosが英放送局ITVのストリーミング配信会社BritBox Internationalの株式50％を2億5500万ポンドで買収、ITVは広告収入によるストリーミング配信サービスITVXに注力（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
BBC Studios buys British broadcaster ITV's 50% stake in streamer BritBox International for £255M, as ITV focuses on its ad-funded streaming service ITVX  —  The streamer was founded in 2017 as a joint venture between BBC Studios, which is the commercial arm of the British broadcaster, and ITV.
